system.description: The character's precision allows them to target specific locations on large vehicles and creatures.
system.benefit: When making a Single-Shot Ranged attack against a Target with a Size Trait larger than the character's, the character can modify the hit Location result by an amount up to twice the value of the target's size Trait. EG: Character hits a Leman Russ Tank (Size 7, Massive) with hit roll of 13, hit roll is reversed to 31, the Hull, but can be modified by up to +/- 14, in this instance, 31-->20 (Change of -11), which hits the motive system instead

specialAbilities.name: Precision Against Large Targets
specialAbilities.description: On Single-Shot attacks against larger targets, modify hit location by up to twice their Size trait value.
